description:
Who loves you baby!  2.0 features fully CUSTOMIZABLE ITEMS!!  
After registering from your phone, go to my website at "www.flirtlikeapro.com" and login on the "Be A Man" side. 
From there you check off anything you want to get rid of and submit anything you want to add.  
Then just hit the "Synchronize w/ Server" button and the items will be refreshed with your selections from the server.

Pickup lines are for boys, what women want is a man!

While creating pickup line applications for other mobile platforms I stumbled onto the 'pick up community.'  I read 'The Game', 'Mystery Method' among other sources.  Great stuff!  I was such an AFC in so many ways!

Then I was faced with how to change those old habits and start using new ones.  Every time I went out I'd forget all the stuff I had been reading and I couldn't think of all the great gambits I had read about.  I needed a 'field manual'.

So in this application I've compiled mountains of specific items and organized them so with a few taps on the screen you can find specific ideas for each aspect of your game including...

84 Opening lines (not cheesy pickup lines)
34 Jokes / Gambits / Games to entertain
20 Ways to get a kiss
17 Ways to get a phone number
97 Ways to handle yourself if things start to go sour

COMING SOON, "The Craft" for women!  I found an author of two books on flirting for women to create a female focused application.

BONUS!!  You will be able to see the contents of "The Craft" online at my website so will gain a better understanding of what women are up against while meeting men.

CAUTION.  The customers of "The Craft" will also be able to see the content from the "Be A Man so keep your game clean and sharp are these ladies will see you coming a mile away.

FLIRT-LIKE-A-PRO is not about tricking people like some sort of love potion, rather its a tool to enable men and women to gain the skills they want meet their goals with the opposite sex, be it a hook-up, relationship, marriage or whatever.
